page.title: 08BARKISLAND AND KRUMLIN
page.content: This area is approximately 2km west of Stainland. We have grouped the two areas together, because they merge into one another. They are situated on top of the hillside, and there are beautiful views wherever you look. It is a nice place to live if you like peace and quiet. It is mainly a farming area and the land is used for grazing cattle and silage. There are only a few houses and most of these are in{ {Barkisland.}Here there is a small shop,a pub, a church and a small village school. In {Krumlin}the buildings are mainly farm houses. There are no shops, pubs, or offices but there is a small mill. There is only one bus an hour which goes to {Ripponden}in one direction and{Halifax}in the other.
